name: Engagement
description: Engagement sessions are the perfect opportunity for us to get to know each other before the big day. I believe with certainty that the more comfortable you are on your wedding day, the more beautiful your images will be. For every engagement session, I carefully plan the most incredible backdrops + locations and work closely with my clients to curate the perfect look in terms of attire, hair and makeup and special little details.

name: WEDDING
description: From a castle in the hills of florence, to a luxurious resort in the bahamas. From a backyard wedding in the mountains to a modern warehouse in the city. Each event is captured with love, thoughtfulness and attention to detail no matter the destination.

name: Travelography
description: Landscape and travel photography are closely intertwined with each other. Travel photography, as many sub-genres of art and photography are, is largely undefined and encompasses a wide range of people, locations, cultures and ideas, including landscape photography.
